sqlMap.select: SELECT count(user_name) AS count FROM collector WHERE user_name = #userName#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO collector (user_name, content_id) VALUES (#userName#, #contentId#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE collector SET content_id = #newContentId# WHERE content_id = #contentId# AND user_name = #userName#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM collector WHERE content_id = #contentId# AND user_name = #userName#
